NAME: Taj Mahal
COMMENT: Mughal architecture; built by Shah Jahan; White marble; UNESCO site.

NAME: Qutub Minar
COMMENT: Mamluk dynasty; started by Qutub-ud-din Aibak; highest brick minaret.

NAME: Red Fort
COMMENT: Shah Jahan; originally Qila-e-Mubarak; octagonal plan; UNESCO site.

NAME: Konark Sun Temple
COMMENT: Narasimhadeva I (Ganga Dynasty); Kalinga architecture; "Black Pagoda".

NAME: Hampi (Virupaksha)
COMMENT: Vijayanagara Empire; Dravidian style; Tungabhadra river bank.

NAME: Ajanta Caves
COMMENT: Buddhist rock-cut caves; Vakataka dynasty; Jataka tales murals.

NAME: Ellora Caves
COMMENT: Rashtrakuta dynasty; Kailasa Temple (monolithic); Hindu-Buddhist-Jain.

NAME: Sanchi Stupa
COMMENT: Ashokan era; Mauryan architecture; Toranas (ornate gateways).

NAME: Charminar
COMMENT: Quli Qutub Shah; Indo-Islamic style; built to celebrate end of plague.

NAME: Brihadeeswarar Temple
COMMENT: Rajaraja Chola I; Dravidian architecture; world's first granite temple.

NAME: Fatehpur Sikri
COMMENT: Akbar's capital (1571-1585); Buland Darwaza; Panch Mahal.

NAME: Hawa Mahal
COMMENT: Sawai Pratap Singh; 953 Jharokhas (windows); honeycomb structure.

NAME: Amer Fort
COMMENT: Raja Man Singh I; Sheesh Mahal; blend of Rajput and Mughal styles.

NAME: Gol Gumbaz
COMMENT: Mohammed Adil Shah; "Whispering Gallery"; Indo-Islamic Deccan style.

NAME: Humayun's Tomb
COMMENT: First garden-tomb in India; Persian influence; Bega Begum.

NAME: Gateway of India
COMMENT: George Wittet (Architect); Indo-Saracenic style; commemorates King George V.

NAME: Victoria Memorial
COMMENT: Lord Curzon; Indo-Gothic/British architecture; Makrana marble.

NAME: Khajuraho Group
COMMENT: Chandela Dynasty; Nagara style; erotic and spiritual sculptures.

NAME: Mahabalipuram
COMMENT: Pallava Dynasty; Pancha Rathas (monolithic); Shore Temple.

NAME: Sun Temple Modhera
COMMENT: Bhima I (Chulukya Dynasty); Solanki architecture; Surya Kund.

NAME: Rani ki Vav
COMMENT: Udayamati (Solanki Dynasty); Maru-Gurjara style; 100 Rupee note feature.

NAME: Chittorgarh Fort
COMMENT: Largest fort in India; Vijay Stambha (Tower of Victory); UNESCO.

NAME: Jaisalmer Fort
COMMENT: Rawal Jaisal; "Sonar Quila" (Golden Fort); built with yellow sandstone.

NAME: Elephanta Caves
COMMENT: Rashtrakuta/Silhara; Lord Shiva Trimurti; rock-cut cave site.

NAME: Golconda Fort
COMMENT: Kakatiya roots; Qutub Shahi capital; famous for acoustic signaling.

NAME: Nalanda University
COMMENT: Gupta Empire; ancient Buddhist Mahavihara; library "Dharmaganja".

NAME: Gwalior Fort
COMMENT: Suraj Sen; "Gibraltar of India"; Man Singh Palace.

NAME: Adhai Din Ka Jhonpra
COMMENT: Qutub-ud-din Aibak; earliest mosque in India; built on a Sanskrit college.

NAME: Bibi Ka Maqbara
COMMENT: Azam Shah; "Dakshani Taj" (Taj of the South); Paithan marble.

NAME: Shore Temple
COMMENT: Narasimhavarman II; Pallava style; early structural stone temple.
